trans-unit.source: Represents a file name extension to be associated with the application.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the icon to use for files that use a particular <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>.
The name of the file that contains the icon.
Gets or sets the description of the file type for use by the shell.
A description of the file type.
Gets or sets the file name extension to be associated with the application.
The file name extension to be associated with the application.
Gets or sets the name that uniquely identifies the file association's file type.
The name that uniquely identifies the file type.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*> property to an XML file.
An XML representation of this file association's DefaultIcon.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> property to an XML file.
An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> value.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> property to an XML file.
An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> value.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> property to an XML file.
An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> value.
